divs: sighting detailsi just looked up and saw the strangest, beautiful orb blinking in the air so i got my camera. it's moving around a bit and flashing every color you could see. obviously it's also emitting lots of ir. the sky was totally clear and the camera could only pick up the "orb" and the radio tower near it. i can upload the original high quality version to my ftp server if you want it. it's recorded from near the asu soccer field on mcclellan drive in the direction of memphis. *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg). thanks, *(wit's first name deleted--cms\sg).
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Jonesboro
There were no other sightings in Jonesboro on or around January 13th 2011
Summary: colorful, extremely fast blinking light drifting about
